Author: unbearably-white
Text: ❤️ yeah I was briefly slightly underweight before going the treatment. I actually did like my body, I was still miserable but at least I hated myself less ya know. I know it's all a lie and shit but I still find myself doing all the same shit.  thank you.

Author: alphaglucose
Text: I am so sorry that you're going through this - it's truly awful to see *that* number that literally flips your world around for some weird inexplicable reason. I've been there and got down to that  underweight BMI. I was convinced everything would change - it didn't. I still feel the exact same way and my body looks the same to me. Your eating disorder lies to you - it tells you you'll be happier when you're nearly dead but that's not going to help.   &#x200B;  Take care, mate
